Text.content: React, Angular, Vue, GraphQL, Next.js, Websockets, SvelteKit
Cypress, PlayWright, Jest, PyTest, React Testing
React, Next, Svelte, SvelteKit, Fastapi, Django

JavaScript Developer with 6 years of experience in frontend and backend, specializing in React, Next, SvelteKit, and NestJS. I have worked on streaming platforms, e-commerce, and scalable applications, always ensuring performance, security, and best development practices. My expertise includes API integrations, UI/UX optimization, and automated testing (Playwright, Jest). I have delivered robust and scalable solutions for companies ranging from startups to large enterprises.

Beyond technical skills, I am a proactive, communicative, and adaptable professional, always striving to align technology with business needs. I have experience leading teams, implementing agile methodologies, and ensuring efficient deliveries. My goal is to add value to the team by improving processes and fostering a collaborative environment.
Fullstack Developer São Paulo - Brazil Jan 2025 - Present
· Reduced repetitive code by 40% by creating reusable components with the design team.
· Collaborated to enhance code quality by establishing coding and design patterns in frontend calls.

. Context: Febrafar represents associativist pharmacy networks, providing management support, supplier negotiations, and competitive strategies. I joined as a frontend developer using SvelteKit, enhancing the digital platform's user interface to improve member engagement and operational efficiency.
· Up to 15% increase in delivery efficiency was achieved by identifying key individuals to attend the meetings, reducing the need for the entire development team to be present.
· Established processes measured by 20% workflow efficiency increase using team collaboration.

· Context: Blankfactor is a tech company specializing in software engineering and financial services, aiding firms in digital product development and process optimization, with a focus on fintechs and banks. I joined as a lead full-stack developer at fintech FisGlobal to initiate the development of a retirement platform for U.S. citizens.
o Eliminated need for cross-service queries measured by workflow efficiency using a message queue system.
· Achieved 20% error reduction through guided error analysis and task creation, improving overall software quality.
· Directed app project, achieving milestones 2 weeks ahead by employing Scrum methodologies.

· Context: A Fleeting Gestão de Frotas provides fleet management solutions to optimize vehicle use, reduce operational costs, and enhance logistical efficiency through technology and automation. As the frontend tech lead, I developed a driver-focused app while addressing both frontend and backend project challenges, thereby assuming a broader tech lead role to enhance overall project success.
· Increased ticket sales by 15% by developing an additional website for non-app users.
· Improved backend system by preventing overbooked flights using updated validation techniques.
· Reduced manual quotation time from 1 day to 2 hours, facilitating internal team's efficiency through automation.
o Improved project workflow by optimizing team interactions using a unified communication strategy.
. Cut development time to 4 months by applying advanced front-end methodologies solo.

· Context: Vuori is a Brazilian company specializing in currency exchange systems for brokerage firms. I was hired to work on client projects, including an internal dashboard for BRINKS to optimize money transfer processes, and a flight management system for an air transport project.
Front end Developer São Paulo - Brazil Nov 2021 - Aug 2022
· Guided junior team, cutting bugs and PR rejections by 40% through regular feedback sessions
o Enhanced login efficiency access time using direct Facebook SSO integration.
· Led team to deliver projects 20% ahead of schedule by optimizing workflows.

. Context: TM1 Brand Experience is a Brazilian holding company focused on brand experiences through live, hybrid, and digital events. Within TM1, I worked at Oli Live Shopping, a startup specializing in live commerce solutions. At Oli, I developed the client-facing livestream dashboard, kickstarted the mobile project, built the live chat, supported video editing, and mentored junior developers. We delivered projects for major brands like Netflix, Meta (Facebook), and Vale.
· Optimized an entire dating app to support 30% more smartphones by refactoring and implementing techniques for weaker devices.
· Reduced critical bug impact on 100% user base by fixing bugs in over 5 applications using enhanced debugging tools.

. Context: Sinn Tecnologia, a Brazilian company specializing in business solutions, IT consultancy, and governance, excels in BI solutions using Pentaho. I was initially hired to resolve issues in client apps and subsequently developed a relationship app, enhancing user experience and functionality.

Renan Olovics LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/renan-olovics GitHub: github.com/Renan-Olovics Email: renanolovics@gmail.com Phone: +55 (11) 961960504 # Skills

· Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python
· Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud, Vercel
· Mobile: React Native, EXPO, Flipper
· Tests: Cypress, PlayWright, Jest, PyTest, React Testing
· Frameworks: React, Next, Svelte, SvelteKit, Fastapi, Django
· Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB
· Devops: Github Actions, Docker, Jenkins
